column4: U.S. growth fund managers still bullish on Tesla after shares tumble
column5: NEW YORK Growth fund managers who have long held shares in Tesla Inc said they were still confident in the electric car maker even after production problems sent the stock diving more than 15 percent from its all-time high.

column4: RPT-U.S. growth fund managers still bullish on Tesla after shares tumble
column5: NEW YORK  July 14 Growth fund managers who have long held shares in Tesla Inc said they were still confident in the electric car maker even after production problems sent the stock diving more than 15 percent from its all-time high.

column4: BRIEF-Mobileye announces receipt of Israel Tax Authority ruling
column5: * Mobileye announces receipt of Israel Tax Authority ruling and further extension of cash tender offer

column4: BRIEF-Intel announces receipt of Israel Tax Authority ruling
column5: * Intel announces receipt of Israel Tax Authority ruling for Mobileye asset sale and further extension of cash tender offer for all outstanding shares of Mobileye
